snippet.title: Holy Shoot Official Demo Trailer
snippet.description:
In Holy Shoot, the player embarks on a journey as a member of The Sanctum. The ultimate goal is to defeat the powerful demons that represent the Seven Deadly Sins. Each character, is granted unique abilities and traits that make them valuable assets in the fight against demonic forces.

The demo is out, join the fight now!

Play Demo here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3265630/Holy_Shoot_Demo/

► Website: https://holyshoot.taleera.com
► Wishlist Now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2881660/Holy_Shoot/

For more news, stay tuned to:
https://discord.gg/2n86kJ8mej
https://twitter.com/HolyShootGame
https://www.instagram.com/holyshootgame/
https://www.twitch.tv/holyshootgame
